Package com.Game.observer

Class GameLogger

java.lang.Object
com.Game.observer.GameLogger
public class GameLogger extends Object
GameLogger class serves as a facade for the logging system. It initializes and manages the LogEntryBuffer and observers, providing a simplified interface for the game components to log actions.

    • getInstance

      public static GameLogger getInstance(String p_logFilePath, boolean p_appendToFile)
      Gets the singleton instance of GameLogger. Creates a new instance if one doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      p_logFilePath - The path of the log file
      p_appendToFile - If true, append to existing file; if false, create new file
      Returns:
      The GameLogger singleton instance

    • getInstance

      public static GameLogger getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance with default configuration if it exists.
      Returns:
      The existing GameLogger instance or null if not initialized
